# Comprehensive Specification: Price Estimation Tab Interface with Calculator

## 1. Problem Statement

The current Price Estimation section displays two card-style links for "Bust" and "Relief" sculptures that simply navigate to the contact section. Users need an interactive tab-based interface that matches the provided design (dark purple toggle tabs) and reveals calculator options when clicked, allowing them to estimate the cost of a sculpture based on configurable parameters.

## 2. User Story

**As a** potential customer visiting the BMG website,  
**I want** to toggle between "Bust" and "Relief" sculpture types and see relevant pricing calculator options,  
**So that** I can estimate the cost of my desired sculpture before contacting the company.

## 3. Acceptance Criteria

### Happy Path
- **GIVEN** a user viewing the Price Estimation section
- **WHEN** the page loads
- **THEN** they see a "Price Estimation" header with two toggle tabs ("Bust" and "Relief") in a dark purple color scheme matching the reference image

- **GIVEN** the Price Estimation section is displayed
- **WHEN** a user clicks the "Bust" tab
- **THEN** the Bust tab becomes visually active and displays bust-specific calculator options (e.g., size, material, complexity)

- **GIVEN** the Bust tab is active
- **WHEN** a user clicks the "Relief" tab
- **THEN** the Relief tab becomes active and shows relief-specific calculator options

### Edge Cases
- **GIVEN** the page loads
- **WHEN** no tab has been clicked yet
- **THEN** the first tab (Bust) should be active by default

- **GIVEN** a user has selected options in one tab
- **WHEN** they switch to another tab
- **THEN** the previous tab's selections should be preserved (in memory)

### Error Handling
- **GIVEN** JavaScript is disabled
- **WHEN** a user views the section
- **THEN** both tab contents should be visible in a stacked layout (graceful degradation)

## 4. Technical Context

| Aspect | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Affected Files | `src/components/sections/PriceEstimation.astro`, new calculator component files |
| Dependencies | None - pure Astro with client-side JavaScript |
| Constraints | Must work without framework-specific JS, Tailwind CSS v4, Astro 5.x |
| Patterns to Follow | Existing component structure in `src/components/`, global.css theme colors (`bmg-primary: #1a1a2e`), Button.astro patterns |

## 5. Non-Goals

- **NOT** implementing actual price calculation logic or backend integration
- **NOT** storing form data or submitting to a server
- **NOT** real pricing - just UI structure for calculator inputs
- **NOT** animated transitions between tabs (can be added later)

## 6. Implementation Tasks

```tasks
## Phase 1: Foundation - Tab UI Structure
- [ ] T001: Replace current card grid with tab toggle UI matching reference design | File: src/components/sections/PriceEstimation.astro
- [ ] T002: Add tab styling with dark purple colors (#2C266C / #5B5594 from reference) | File: src/styles/global.css

## Phase 2: Core Implementation - Calculator Content
- [ ] T003: Create BustCalculator content section with size/material/complexity options | File: src/components/sections/PriceEstimation.astro
- [ ] T004: Create ReliefCalculator content section with dimensions/detail level options | File: src/components/sections/PriceEstimation.astro
- [ ] T005: Add client-side JavaScript for tab switching functionality | File: src/components/sections/PriceEstimation.astro

## Phase 3: Polish & Accessibility
- [ ] T006: Add ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation for tabs | File: src/components/sections/PriceEstimation.astro
- [ ] T007: Add graceful degradation for no-JS environments | File: src/components/sections/PriceEstimation.astro
```

## 7. Success Metrics

| Criteria | Measurement |
|----------|-------------|
| Visual match | Tab toggle matches reference image (dark purple toggle with Bust/Relief options) |
| Tab switching | Clicking tabs toggles content visibility without page reload |
| Calculator display | Each tab shows relevant calculator form inputs |
| Accessibility | Tabs navigable via keyboard, proper ARIA roles |
| No JS fallback | Content visible (stacked) when JavaScript disabled |

## 8. Risks & Mitigations

| Risk | Mitigation |
|------|------------|
| Tab styling conflicts with existing Tailwind utilities | Use specific custom CSS classes in global.css with unique naming |
| Client-side JS hydration issues in Astro | Use `<script>` tag with vanilla JS instead of framework components |
| Calculator options undefined by client | Provide placeholder options initially; can be refined with client feedback |
| Color mismatch with brand | Extract exact colors from reference image (#2C266C for dark, #5B5594 for lighter) |
